languages.text: {n}Гости, окружающие губернатора, почтительно умолкают при вашем приближении. Судя по обрывку последней фразы, только что они обсуждали чье-то ужасное отравление, случившееся на прошлом рауте.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Гости, окружающие губернатора, почтительно умолкают при вашем приближении. Судя по обрывку последней фразы, только что они обсуждали чье-то ужасное отравление, случившееся на прошлом рауте.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The guests around the governor fall into a deferential hush at your approach. Judging by the last bit of their conversation, they were just discussing someone's horrible poisoning that took place at the last society gathering.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Гости, окружающие губернатора, почтительно умолкают при вашем приближении. Судя по обрывку последней фразы, только что они обсуждали чье-то ужасное отравление, случившееся на прошлом рауте.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The guests around Urbend quiet respectfully at your approach. Judging by the last bit of their conversation, they were just discussing someone's horrible poisoning that took place at the previous rout.{/n}

{n}The guests around Urbend quiet respectfully at your approach. Judging by the last bit of their conversation, they were just discussing someone's horrible poisoning that took place at the previous rout.{/n}

{n}The guests around the governor fall into a deferential hush at your approach. Judging by the last bit of their conversation, they were just discussing someone's horrible poisoning that took place at the last society gathering.{/n}

languages.text: {n}総督を取り巻くゲストは、あなたが近づくと敬意を表して沈黙する。会話の終わり際から判断するに、前回の社交での集まりで起きた陰惨な毒殺事件について話していたようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The guests around the governor fall into a deferential hush at your approach. Judging by the last bit of their conversation, they were just discussing someone's horrible poisoning that took place at the last society gathering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総督を取り巻くゲストは、あなたが近づくと敬意を表して沈黙する。会話の終わり際から判断するに、前回の社交での集まりで起きた陰惨な毒殺事件について話していたようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你到来时，总督身边的宾客对你肃然起敬。从他们的谈话内容来看，他们仅仅是在讨论上次聚会时某人中毒的可怕事故。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The guests around the governor fall into a deferential hush at your approach. Judging by the last bit of their conversation, they were just discussing someone's horrible poisoning that took place at the last society gathering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你到来时，总督身边的宾客对你肃然起敬。从他们的谈话内容来看，他们仅仅是在讨论上次聚会时某人中毒的可怕事故。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los invitados que rodean al gobernador guardan un respetuoso silencio al acercarte. A juzgar por lo último que oyes, estaban hablando de un terrible envenenamiento que tuvo lugar en la última reunión social.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The guests around the governor fall into a deferential hush at your approach. Judging by the last bit of their conversation, they were just discussing someone's horrible poisoning that took place at the last society gathering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los invitados que rodean al gobernador guardan un respetuoso silencio al acercarte. A juzgar por lo último que oyes, estaban hablando de un terrible envenenamiento que tuvo lugar en la última reunión social.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À votre approche, le gazouillement des invités se réduit à des chuchotements respectueux. Du peu que vous avez saisi de leur conversation, ils discutaient jusque-là d'un terrible cas d'empoisonnement survenu lors de leur dernière petite sauterie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The guests around the governor fall into a deferential hush at your approach. Judging by the last bit of their conversation, they were just discussing someone's horrible poisoning that took place at the last society gathering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À votre approche, le gazouillement des invités se réduit à des chuchotements respectueux. Du peu que vous avez saisi de leur conversation, ils discutaient jusque-là d'un terrible cas d'empoisonnement survenu lors de leur dernière petite sauterie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Gäste rund um den Gouverneur verstummen respektvoll, als du dich näherst. Dem letzten Gesprächsfetzen nach zu urteilen, ging es gerade um eine schreckliche Vergiftung beim letzten gesellschaftlichen Ereignis.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The guests around the governor fall into a deferential hush at your approach. Judging by the last bit of their conversation, they were just discussing someone's horrible poisoning that took place at the last society gathering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Gäste rund um den Gouverneur verstummen respektvoll, als du dich näherst. Dem letzten Gesprächsfetzen nach zu urteilen, ging es gerade um eine schreckliche Vergiftung beim letzten gesellschaftlichen Ereignis.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Valinin çevresindeki konuklar, sen yaklaşınca saygıyla sessizliğe bürünüyor. Sohbetin sonuna bakınca anlaşılıyor ki sosyetenin son toplanışında yaşanan korkunç zehirlenme hadisesini konuşuyorlarmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The guests around the governor fall into a deferential hush at your approach. Judging by the last bit of their conversation, they were just discussing someone's horrible poisoning that took place at the last society gathering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Valinin çevresindeki konuklar, sen yaklaşınca saygıyla sessizliğe bürünüyor. Sohbetin sonuna bakılacak olunursa, sosyetenin son toplanışında birisinin korkunç bir şekilde zehirlenmesini konuşuyorlarmış.{/n}
